tool_description: Use Palette's new AI engine (which powers 2.8 Millon users) to colorize your video frames.
name: Colorize Video
title: Colorize Video

api_list.name: read_root__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://colorize-video.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colorize-video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
